definitions.body: complete, perfect: in beauty Ct So 5:2, So 6:9; of physical strength Ps 73:4 (rd. [[לָָמוֹ תָּם]] Ew De Dr:Sam. xxxi Che Bae al.).
sound, wholesome: [[אישׁ תָּם]], of Jacob as tent-dweller, opp. Esau, hunter, Ge 25:27 (J; De leutseliger Mann, Di ruhig, still, AV RV plain man; ´[[ת]]: here poss. redactional, =

complete, morally innocent, having integrity: [[אִישׁ תָּם]] Job 1:8, Job 2:3; ´[[ת]]: alone Job 1:1, Job 8:20, Job 9:20, Job 9:21, Job 9:22, Pr 29:10, Ps 37:37, Ps 64:5.—[[תַּמִּים]] v.[[[תָּאם]]]. p. 1060f
